newsitem.title: UK: Timah at 14.6 in London at 0821 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Timah at 14.6 in London at 0821 GMT.

text.p: PT Tambang Timah was traded at $14.6 per GDR in London on Thursday at around 0821 GMT.
It recorded a low of $14.575 and a high of $14.6.
Its previous close on Wednesday was $14.3.
One Global Depository Receipt represents 10 common shares.
